item.title: 早间竞价：投资者阅读美联储茶叶，回避中国刺激政策
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 消息人士称，评级下调迫在眉睫，波音正在权衡筹集现金的方案
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的消息人士称，波音公司正在研究通过出售股票和类似股票的证券筹集数十亿美元的方案，因为这家飞机制造商正努力避免其信用评级滑落至垃圾级。【原文：Boeing is examining options to raise billions of dollars through a sale of stock and equity-like securities, two sources familiar with the matter said, as the planemaker tries to avoid slipping in to junk territory on its credit ratings.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，花旗回击纽约关于欺诈案的诉讼
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，花旗集团的律师已敦促美国地区法官保罗-奥特肯（Paul Oetken）驳回总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）于今年 1 月提起的诉讼，该诉讼指控花旗集团旗下的花旗银行未能向成为网络骗子受害者的客户提供补偿。【原文：Citigroup's lawyers have urged U.S. District Judge Paul Oetken to dismiss a suit filed in January by Attorney General Letitia James, which accuses its Citibank unit of failing to reimburse customers who fall victim to online scammers, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，辉瑞首席执行官计划会见激进投资者 Starboard Value
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引知情人士的话报道称，辉瑞公司首席执行官阿尔伯特-布尔拉（Albert Bourla）计划与激进投资者Starboard Value会面。【原文：Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla plans to meet activist investor Starboard Value, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Unifor 与加拿大太平洋堪萨斯城公司启动谈判
item.description: Unifor 周二表示，在与加拿大国家铁路公司（Canadian National Railway）展开谈判仅几周后，它已与堪萨斯城加拿大太平洋铁路公司（Canadian Pacific Kansas City）启动了合同谈判。【原文：Unifor said on Tuesday it has initiated contract negotiations with Canadian Pacific Kansas City , just weeks after it opened negotiations with Canadian National Railway .】

item.title: 罢工持续，标普将波音评级列入负面信用观察名单
item.description: 全球评级机构 S&P 周二表示，已将波音公司的评级列入负面信用观察名单，因为这家美国飞机制造商的约 33,000 名工人仍在罢工，导致其最畅销的喷气式飞机停产。【原文：Global ratings agency S&P said on Tuesday it had placed Boeing's rating on CreditWatch negative as about 33,000 of the U.S. planemaker's workers remain on strike, halting production of its best-selling jets.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪预计 2025 年墨西哥电动汽车销量将增至 10 万辆
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪墨西哥负责人豪尔赫-巴列霍（Jorge Vallejo）周二表示，该公司预计今年将在墨西哥销售 5 万辆电动汽车（EV），2025 年将达到 10 万辆。【原文：Chinese electric automaker BYD expects to sell 50,000 electric vehicles (EVs) in Mexico this year, and then 100,000 in 2025, the company's Mexican head Jorge Vallejo said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯预计将进一步降息，因相信通胀正在缓解
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）周二表示，随着通胀趋势越来越弱，美国央行很有可能会进行更多的降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said on Tuesday that with inflation trends growing weaker it is very probable that the U.S. central bank can deliver more interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国联邦航空局可能在本月批准 SpaceX 星际飞船 5 的许可证
item.description: 一位消息人士周二告诉路透社，美国联邦航空管理局最快可能在本月批准发射 SpaceX 的 "星际飞船 5 号"（Starship 5）。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration could approve a license for the launch of SpaceX's Starship 5 as soon as this month, a source told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 宝洁创始人后代要求罢免首席执行官和董事会委员会的申请失败
item.description: 本周二，宝洁公司创始人的后裔在要求罢免首席执行官乔恩-默勒（Jon Moeller）和负责环境可持续发展的委员会成员的诉讼中败诉，因为他们被指控未能管理消费品制造商供应链中的森林砍伐风险。【原文：Descendants of Procter & Gamble's founders lost a bid on Tuesday to oust CEO Jon Moeller and members of the committee overseeing environmental sustainability for allegedly failing to manage deforestation risks in the consumer goods maker's supply chain.】

item.title: 巴西总检察长支持恢复社交媒体平台 X
item.description: 巴西总检察长办公室周二在一份声明中告诉巴西最高法院，在社交媒体平台 X 因法律纠纷在当地被关闭后，总检察长办公室认为没有理由不恢复该平台。【原文：Brazil's attorney general's office told the country's Supreme Court on Tuesday that it does not see reasons why social medial platform X should not be reinstated, according to a statement, after it was shut down locally due to a legal dispute.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称劳动力市场放缓但并不缓慢，就业增长 "强劲
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周二表示，上周的就业数据证实，尽管美国劳动力市场可能正在放缓，但美国劳动力市场依然强劲，4.1%的失业率接近充分就业水平，雇主增加工作岗位的速度超过了人口增长所需的速度。【原文：Last week's jobs numbers confirm the U.S. labor market remains strong even though it may be slowing, with a 4.1% unemployment rate around what is considered full employment and employers adding jobs faster than what is needed to account for population growth, Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 阿根廷九月份通胀率为 2021 年底以来最低水平
item.description: 路透社周二对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，阿根廷 9 月份的月通胀率预计将放缓至 3.5%，这将是自 2021 年底以来的最低月通胀率。【原文：Argentina's monthly inflation rate is expected to have slowed to 3.5% in September, which would be the lowest monthly rate since the end of 2021, a Reuters poll of economists showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: EIA 称，随着 2024 年需求创历史新高，美国天然气产量将下降
item.description: 美国能源信息署（EIA）在周二发布的《短期能源展望》（STEO）报告中称，2024年美国天然气产量将下降，而需求将上升至历史最高水平。【原文：U.S. natural gas production will decline in 2024 while demand will rise to a record high, the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) said in its Short Term Energy Outlook (STEO) on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贸易消息人士称，贸易商维托尔公司向印度炼油商出售委内瑞拉石油
item.description: 贸易消息人士称，两家印度国营炼油厂已从贸易公司维托尔（Vitol）购买了 200 万桶委内瑞拉原油，将于 11 月交货，因为运往委内瑞拉第二大石油市场的原油继续增加。【原文：Two Indian state refiners have bought 2 million barrels of Venezuelan crude from trading house Vitol for November delivery, trade sources said, as shipments to what previously was Venezuela's second largest oil market continue to grow.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司从波士顿银行股票抛售狂潮中获利 100 亿美元
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）领导的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）周一晚些时候提交的一份文件显示，该公司进一步削减了其在美国银行（Bank of America）的股份，自 7 月份开始出售股份以来，这家投资巨头已净赚 100 多亿美元。【原文：Warren Buffett-led Berkshire Hathaway further cut its stake in Bank of America , a late Monday filing showed, netting the investment giant more than $10 billion since it started the share sale in July.】

item.title: 美国银行利润将因利息收入减少而缩水，焦点转向美联储减息政策
item.description: 周五，摩根大通和富国银行将揭开该行业财报的序幕，在强劲的就业数据加剧了美联储未来降息路径的不确定性之后，投资者预计将重点关注大型银行对净利息收入的预测。【原文：JPMorgan Chase and Wells Fargo kick off earnings for the sector on Friday, and investors are expected to focus on the big banks' forecasts for net interest income after strong jobs data fueled uncertainty about the path of future Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州应对飓风米尔顿，航空公司取消航班，机场关闭
item.description: 由于预计飓风 "米尔顿 "将于周三登陆佛罗里达州，佛罗里达州一些机场关闭，美国航空公司正在取消航班和调整时间表。【原文：U.S. airlines are canceling flights and adjusting schedules as some Florida airports close in anticipation of disruptions from Hurricane Milton, which is set to make landfall in the state on Wednesday.】

item.title: 仲裁裁定英国石油公司作为科斯莫斯能源公司塞内加尔液化天然气项目的唯一买家胜诉
item.description: 科斯莫斯能源公司（Kosmos Energy）周二称，巴黎的一名仲裁员作出了有利于英国石油公司的裁决，禁止科斯莫斯公司向第三方出售来自塞内加尔和毛里塔尼亚近海大托尔图（GTA）项目的液化天然气。【原文：Kosmos Energy said on Tuesday a Paris-based arbitrator has ruled in favour of BP , prohibiting Kosmos from selling to third parties liquefied natural gas from the Greater Tortue (GTA) project offshore Senegal and Mauritania.】

item.title: 聚焦：弧钒公司庞大的锂投资组合适时吸引了里约公司
item.description: 从魁北克北部的苔原到阿根廷的安第斯山脉，再到西澳大利亚的高原，Arcadium 近 40 年来的锂矿组合吸引了力拓，因为力拓希望在市场周期的有利时机成为电动汽车电池金属的顶级生产商。【原文：From northern Quebec's tundra to Argentina's Andes Mountains and the plateaus of Western Australia, Arcadium's lithium portfolio, brought together over almost 40 years, has lured Rio Tinto , as it bids to be a top producer of the EV battery metal at an advantageous point in the market cycle.】

item.title: 备忘录称美国银行任命布拉巴松为全球并购部门联席主管
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封内部邮件，美国银行已任命 Eamon Brabazon 为全球并购联合主管，与 Ivan Farman 并列。【原文：Bank of America has named Eamon Brabazon co-head of global mergers and acquisitions, alongside Ivan Farman, according to an internal email seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 墨西哥沃尔玛期待反垄断监管机构尽快做出最终裁决
item.description: 墨西哥沃尔玛（Walmex）是美国零售巨头沃尔玛在墨西哥的分支机构，该公司一位高级管理人员周二表示，预计反垄断监督机构 Cofece 将很快宣布其对涉嫌反竞争行为调查的最终裁决。【原文：Mexico's Walmex , the local unit of U.S.-based retail giant Walmart , expects antitrust watchdog Cofece to soon announce its final ruling stemming from a probe into alleged anti-competitive practices, a senior executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 大陆集团预计第三季度欧洲和北美汽车产量将下降
item.description: 德国汽车供应商大陆集团（Continental）周二表示，预计第三季度全球乘用车和轻型卡车产量将比第二季度下降 3%，但随着中国汽车制造商市场份额的增加，中国产量将增长约 4%。【原文：German automotive supplier Continental said on Tuesday that it expected global production of passenger cars and light trucks in the third quarter to fall more 3% from the second quarter but Chinese output to grow at about 4% with Chinese carmakers increasing market share.】

item.title: 塔斯社报道：俄罗斯封杀即时通讯平台 Discord
item.description: 据塔斯社周二报道，俄罗斯通信监管机构以违反俄罗斯法律为由封杀了即时通讯平台 Discord，使这家总部位于旧金山的公司成为在俄罗斯受到限制的最新外国技术平台。【原文：Russia's communications regulator has blocked instant messaging platform Discord for violating Russian law, the TASS news agency reported on Tuesday, making the San Francisco-based company the latest foreign technology platform to be restricted in Russia.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，布鲁塞尔拒绝了中国在电动汽车争端中提出的 3 万欧元最低销售价格的建议
item.description: 三位消息人士称，布鲁塞尔拒绝了中国政府关于中国制造的进口电动汽车最低售价为30,000欧元（合32,946美元）的提议，中国政府希望此举能避免欧盟下月征收关税。【原文：Brussels rejected a proposal by the Chinese government for imported electric vehicles made in China to be sold at a minimum price of 30,000 euros ($32,946), three sources said, a move Beijing hoped would avert EU tariffs being imposed next month.】

item.title: 美国水务公司在发生 "网络安全事件 "后切断电脑连接
item.description: 美国供水和污水处理公用事业公司 American Water 表示，在发生不明 "网络安全事件 "后，该公司已暂停计费，取消了客户服务，并切断了部分计算机的连接。【原文：U.S. water and sewage utility American Water said it has paused billing, yanked its customer service, and disconnected some of its computers following an unspecified "cybersecurity incident."】

item.title: 罢工影响产量，波音 9 月交付 33 架喷气式飞机
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，由于本月中旬美国西海岸工厂约 33,000 名工人举行罢工，影响了产量，该公司 9 月份交付了 33 架喷气式飞机，低于 8 月份的 40 架。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it delivered 33 jets in September, down from 40 plane deliveries in August, as a strike mid-month by around 33,000 U.S. West Coast factory workers weighs on output.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局就波音 737 飞机方向舵问题发出安全警报
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周二向航空公司发出安全警报，警告某些波音 737 飞机的方向舵运动可能受限或被卡住。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration on Tuesday issued a safety alert to airlines warning of the potential for limited or jammed rudder movement on certain Boeing 737 airplanes.】

item.title: Crypto.com 收到监管机构的法律威胁后起诉美国 SEC
item.description: 本周二，Crypto.com 对美国证券交易委员会提起诉讼，指控该联邦机构越权监管加密货币行业。【原文：Crypto.com filed a lawsuit against the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday, alleging that the federal agency is overstepping its jurisdiction by regulating the cryptocurrency industry.】

item.title: 花旗从富国银行聘请拉沃伊主管西海岸私募股权并购业务
item.description: 根据路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录，投资银行家约翰-拉沃伊（John LaVoie）将加入花旗集团，领导其美国西海岸私募股权交易部门。【原文：Investment banker John LaVoie is joining Citigroup to head up its U.S. West Coast private equity dealmaking unit, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】
